name: Sickening Bite
summary: Your saliva causes severe nausea and mild fever in the living, weakening them so that you can more easily finish them off.
description:
Your saliva causes severe nausea and mild fever in the living, weakening them so that you can more easily finish them off. When you critically hit a creature with your jaws, the creature is sickened 1. This is a disease effect.

 If you are satiated, you can end your satiation to make the target sickened 1 on a regular hit instead.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
